title: What is the best, forensic science or criminology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Coming to ur questions ,it depends on ur interest .but there is not separate course of criminology .In India ,there r diploma in criminology .If u want to choose criminology it is the branch of forensic science .U can study it in ur post graduation but together . criminology is specialized branch of forensic science .u can have other branches too. read it if u r still confusedDifference between Forensic Science and Criminology
If you are looking for placement than none of them guarantees it. Take these courses if you really like them and are confident that you can forge your own way ahead.
